name: FamilyPunishmentPicker
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pick a punishment
des:
Who's been naughty? Is it mummy, daddy or the kids? Either way, the family punishment picker will pick a punishment for you!

This is a family friendly skill and all punishments are light hearted and have fun in mind. well, fun for everyone else! 

Enjoy! ;)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
